code: import axios from"axios";var URL="http://localhost:3000/user";export var createUsr=function createUsr(newUser){return axios.post(URL,newUser);};export var getUrs=function getUrs(){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/getall"));};export var getUserById=function getUserById(id){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/").concat(id));};export var getLoginUser=function getLoginUser(user){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/login"),user);};
